server_to_server.title: Server to Server
server_to_server.description: Services, scripts, or processes running on your backend that uses tokens
server_to_server.caption: e.g.: Java, C#, NodeJS, Go, etc.

public.title: Client-side Application
public.description: A javascript or mobile front-end application that uses tokens.
public.caption: e.g.: React, Javascript, iOS and Android.

elements.title: Elements
elements.description: A front-end application embedding Basis Theory Elements to tokenize data.
elements.caption: e.g.: Java C#, Node, JS, Go, etc.

management.title: Management
management.description: Processes needing access to configure features/settings of tokenization platform.
management.caption: e.g.: Terraform, CLIs, Scripts, etc.

404.caption: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

500.caption: We're not exactly sure what happened, but our servers say something is wrong.

SignOutButton.confirmCaption: You can sign in again anytime.
